text: It has been a wonderful experience at Little Footprints Tung Po (YCK)- with not one but 3 of our kids attending the school. The teachers have been amazing, attentive and always looking out for the little ones. We have often been pleasantly surprised with the curriculum and the level of education standard at the school. A special shout put to Ms Kate, Lao Shis, Ms Corrine, Ms Praise and Ms Jerrica for all their love and attention.
Appreciate the care that Miss Jerrica and the teachers show to the children and the effort put in to mark special occasions, with awesome decor by 老师！
Teacher Imah is meticulous and always keeping me update on the progress of my daughter. Kudos 👍🏼
Principal Jerrica with her Team of Teachers (Kate, Liyana, Stephanie, Teacher Lin, Teacher Wu) and supporting staff are the best! Keep it up!!! 👍👍👍👏👏👏
